title: Australia Felix
brief_description: Tom Robert’s paintings portray aspects of Australia’s history. Surveys many of his paintings which show the early history of the Australian way of life. Tom Roberts (1856-1931) travelled in Spain and applied the knowledge gained overseas in starting a new trend in Australian painting - scenes of casual human interest.
